definition[0]: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable
example[0]: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
example[1]: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
example[2]: We hope to give fans something to celebrate this season.
example[3]: How do you usually celebrate New Year?
example[4]: poems that celebrate the joys of love
definition[2]: to perform a religious ceremony, especially the Christian Mass
